mapper.sql: A.id, A.user_id, A.subject, A.message, A.image_name, A.digest, A.keyword, A.url, A.top, A.rate, A.rate_times, A.views, A.status, A.allow_comment, A.created_date, A.last_modified_date, A.deleted
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( id ) FROM cms_article WHERE deleted =0 AND STATUS =1 LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT( id ) FROM cms_article WHERE deleted =0 AND STATUS =1 AND category_id =#{categoryId} LIMIT 1

SELECT, U.username AS user_username, C.id AS cat_id, C.category_name AS cat_category_name, C.description AS cat_description, C.allow_comment AS cat_allow_comment, COMM.username AS comm_username, COMM.message AS comm_message, COMM.status AS comm_status, COMM.created_date AS comm_created_date, COMM.deleted AS comm_deleted FROM cms_article AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_user AS U ON user_id = U.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_category AS C ON category_id = C.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_comment AS COMM ON A.id = COMM.article_id and COMM.deleted=0 and COMM.status=1 WHERE A.id =#{id}
SELECT id,image_name,created_date FROM cms_article WHERE deleted=1

SELECT FROM cms_article AS A WHERE A.deleted=0 AND A.STATUS=1 AND YEAR( created_date ) = YEAR( #{created_date} ) AND MONTH( created_date ) = MONTH( #{created_date} ) ORDER BY top DESC, created_date DESC

SELECT ,U.username as user_username FROM cms_article AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN cms_user AS U ON user_id = U.id WHERE A.deleted =0 AND A.STATUS =1 AND A.id in (select article_id from cms_archive_article where archive_id = #{archiveId}) ORDER BY A.id DESC LIMIT ${offset},${limit}
SELECT id FROM cms_article AS A WHERE A.deleted=0 AND A.STATUS=1 AND A.created_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ORDER BY A.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_article (user_id, category_id, subject, message, image_name, digest, keyword, url, top, rate, rate_times, views, allow_comment, status, deleted, created_date) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{category.id}, #{subject}, #{message}, #{imageName}, #{digest}, #{keyword}, #{url}, #{top}, 0, 0, 0, #{allowComment}, 0, 0, null)
mapper.update:
UPDATE cms_article
category_id=#{category.id},
subject=#{subject},
message=#{message},
image_name=#{imageName},
digest=#{digest},
keyword=#{keyword},
top=#{top},
rate=#{rate},
rate_times=#{rateTimes},
views=#{views},
allow_comment=#{allowComment},
status=#{status},
deleted=#{deleted},
last_modified_date=null
WHERE id=#{id}
